oNama.oNama-Info1: has existed since 1993, and our main business is the distribution of hardware for construction joinery and fittings for furniture.
oNama.oNama-Info2: Dabel is made up of an ambitious, capable, young team willing to improve and advance in providing the best possible services.
oNama.oNama-KljucniJedan: In 2005, a business facility of 5,000 m² was built, housing our production, customs warehouse, technical service, dispatch and sales departments, and all necessary conditions for a quality operation to maintain market leadership in Serbia.
oNama.oNama-KljucniDva: We expanded and opened a branch in Montenegro in 2018.
oNama.oNama-KljucniTri: We continued expansion by opening branches in Kosovo, Bosnia, Macedonia, and Albania in subsequent years.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiJedan: Customer care, fair relations with partners, and concern for the work environment are our priorities. We aim to maintain long‑standing quality and introduce innovations to ease ordering and delivery of products.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiDva: We have introduced B2B ordering, where our partners can order goods at any time.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiTri_Jedan: we introduced ordering of goods online through
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiTri_Dva: , which is continuously improved to provide partners with all necessary product information.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiPet: Our mission is to act responsibly, focusing on customer care and improving the quality of our products.

usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedan: allows you to use the services and content of its website in accordance with the terms below. These terms apply to all content and services on the site.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Dva: It is assumed that users are familiar with these terms if they use any part of the site, and accept that the site's content is used solely for personal use and at their own risk.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Tri: holds copyright for all content (textual, visual and audio materials, databases and program code). Unauthorized use of any portion without the owner's permission is considered a copyright violation and may lead to legal consequences.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Cetiri: Important changes and additions to the terms may be communicated to users via email or published on the website.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Pet: By using the site, you are considered aware of the latest rules regarding the terms of use and privacy policy.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Sest: Dabel d.o.o endeavors to provide accurate product information, including images, descriptions, and technical details, but cannot guarantee complete accuracy due to possible technical errors. Product colors on screen may differ from real ones.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Sedam: Data you provide on the site are used for internal purposes and will be protected in accordance with the law on personal data protection.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Osam: Data will not be published or shared with third parties without your consent.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Devet: The site may contain links to external sites for improved user experience. Dabel d.o.o is not responsible for content on those external sites.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-ZaposljavanjeNaslov: Employment and Handling of Applicant Data
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Deset: When selecting and hiring, the candidate agrees that Dabel d.o.o uses their data exclusively for the selection process. Data are stored on our internal servers and not shared with third parties.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedanest_Jedan: Applicants may withdraw consent at any time by contacting via email address,
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedanest_Dva: after which their data will be deleted from the database.

posao.posao-PosaoTitl: WE ARE LOOKING FOR WORKERS TO PACKAGE PRODUCTS
posao.posao-Jedan: If you are interested in joining our team, you may send your resume, which we will review and contact you should the need for new employees arise.
posao.posao-Dva: Send applications with the resume to the address:
posao.posao-Tri: We thank all interested applicants in advance.

kontakt.kontakt-RadnoVremePostaTermin: Working days from 7 AM to 3 PM

brzoPorucivanje.CSV mora imati kolone Šifra i Količina: CSV must have columns Code and Quantity
brzoPorucivanje.CSV fajl nema validne podatke: CSV file does not contain valid data
brzoPorucivanje.klikni dugme i usmeri kameru na barkod: Click the button and aim the camera at the barcode.
brzoPorucivanje.unesi šifru, pritisni Enter i upiši koli: Enter the code, press Enter and type the quantity.
brzoPorucivanje.koristi Uvezi CSV dugme sa kolonama Šifr: Use the Import CSV button with Code and Quantity columns.
brzoPorucivanje.kada završiš, klikni na dugme: When you finish, click the button.
